document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Bells </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">stop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">ringing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Church </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">begins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Positive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Bells </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Cogs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9848ff">stop </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Circumference </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">Ultimate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Wheels </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: When bells stop ringing - church begins
